query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Latvian | Lemma | English | Italian | Lithuanian | Slovak | Bulgarian | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Mūsu | mēs | | | | | | | dzīves | dzīve | | | | | | | ceļā | ceļš | | | | | | | vidū | vidus | | | | | | | es | es | | | | | | | atrados | atrasties | | | | | | | tumšā | tumšs | | | | | | | mežā | mežs | | | | | | | jo | jo | | | | | | | taisnais | taisns | | | | | | | ceļš | ceļš | | | | | | | bija | būt | | | | | | | pazudis | pazust | | | | | |
